name: Engineering
description: Responsible for software development, system architecture, and technical innovation. Our engineering team builds and maintains the core products and platforms.

name: Marketing
description: Drives brand awareness, customer acquisition, and market expansion. The marketing team handles campaigns, content creation, and market analysis.

description: Oversees day-to-day business operations and process optimization. Operations ensures efficient workflows and operational excellence.
